articles.title: How to watch Apple's WWDC 2025 keynote
articles.description: Apple is expected to unveil changes to its operating systems iOS, iPadOS, macOS, watchOS, tvOS, and visionOS at its Worldwide Developers Conference.
articles.content:
Apple is hosting its 2025 Worldwide Developers Conference starting Monday, with the keynote scheduled for Monday at 10 a.m. PT / 1 p.m. ET.

articles.title: No winners in both Super Lotto and Ultra Lotto draws for June 8
articles.description: No bettor won the P57.9 million jackpot prize for the Super Lotto 6/49 draw on Sunday night, according to PCSO.
articles.content:
MANILA, Philippines — No bettor won the P57.9 million jackpot prize for the Super Lotto 6/49 draw on Sunday night, according to the Philippine Charity Sweepstakes Office (PCSO).

articles.title: Colombia: President Petro vows to find mastermind after teen arrested at scene where rival Miguel Uribe was shot
articles.description: Colombian President Gustavo Petro has vowed to find the mastermind behind the shooting of rival Miguel Uribe, who remains in critical condition after being shot in the head at a campaign event. A 15-year-old with a 9mm pistol was arrested at the scene.
articles.content: Colombian President Gustavo Petro has vowed to leave no stone unturned in identifying those behind the attempted assassination of opposition senator and potential presidential contender Miguel Uribe. The 39-year-old conservative lawmaker was shot dur... [3208 chars]

articles.description: A 'powerhouse' in the world of Disney has sadly died at the age of 58 following a cancer battle a statement has confirmed as tributes pour in
articles.content:
A Disney legend has died after an eight month battle with cancer. The death of respected entertainment publicist Danny Duran was confirmed in a touching social media post. He was 58 years old.

articles.title: Wexford cruise past Antrim to book quarter-final berth
articles.description: Wexford gained pay back against Antrim at Chadwicks Wexford Park on Sunday to power through to the last-eight of the Tailteann Cup on a 5-23 to 2-21 scoreline.
articles.content:
Wexford gained pay back against Antrim at Chadwicks Wexford Park to power through to the last-eight of the Tailteann Cup, winning in the end by 11 points.
